name: QUAL_MEAS_SEARCH_INFO
description: The QUAL_MEAS_SEARCH_INFO table contains information about quality measure search and template records.

columns.name: QM_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the search/template record.

columns.name: QM_TEMPLATE_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of a quality measure search.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of a quality measure search.
